Summary: White Lights around a cylinder, hovering above trees silently moving very slow
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Royal Oak
There were no other sightings in Royal Oak on or around June 4th 1993
divs: sighting detailsme and my family were in the foodland parking lot. we saw it come over a tree-line and moved very slow south. we were in madison heights\royal oak. it appeared black with white textured lights around the side. it made no noise and moved very slow. i have never seen any picture of a ufo that looked like it. that same month the only nuclear weapons facility in michigan closed, we think this may have something to do with this siting. from what it looked like, it was flat black and the shape of a disk. we were shocked, and are still shocked. please let me know if you saw the same thing that night, we have been wanting to talk to someone else who saw it too. it was out in the open, thats why i think someone else had to have seen it.
